content.rendered:
This site does not host any copyrighted material on its server. All the manga featured on this website are the property of their publishers. The translations are Famachine-nanomiade and meant to be a preview of material unavailable for Western countries. Do not try to profit from this material.
If any files violate copyright content, or if you want files to be removed,
Please direct your complaint toward the responsible parties such as storage hosting

If you still believe your intellectual property is illegally hosted on our servers,
Or there are other problems. Please contact us and we will investigate the issue..

 

You may send an E-mail to:
asurascanlationbox@gmail.com <——– AsuraScanslation Staff
